Entries.Saloon_Wed: Between you and me, @, the Weed Brownies are my top seller.$h#$b#The main ingredient is harmless as far as the doc is concerned.

Entries.Thu6: Gus and I sometimes sneak a brownie after our shift.#$b#It helps after a stressful day.

Entries.Thu2: There's a strange smell coming from Sam's room sometimes.#$b#I think I know what he's doing, but I really shouldn't stick my nose into his business.#$b#Sam's a grown man now, and I trust he's making good descisions.
Entries.Sat2: I've told Sam if he was going to smoke weed, he should do it outside the house.#$b#I don't want it near Vincent.#$b#And I really hate the smell.

Entries.Sun2: There's a spike in the use of marijuana among the youth of Pelican Town lately.#$b#I just hope they're not using it irresponsibly. The side effects can be quite scary.$2

Entries.Wed8: You should join me and Sebastian for a sesh sometime.$h#$b#Seb always brings a few blunts, too.

Entries.Sat4: I've noticed Marlowe seems to be a bit brighter these days.#$b#You've noticed too?#$b#I'm glad he's feeling better.
